column4: does any 1 know how can i ...add channels ..to fav like open at startup in xchat?
under the server list. has autojoin section :P
you are referng to the azureus auto-update feature?
correct - it dont work right.. let me guess.. your menu items/text are gone?
totally close azaurus. make sure its not in the system tray.
and either restart it and see if it works.. or install it on a PER user basis.
or just dont use the auto-update thing. :P
in the users home dir of course.. with all the other .CONFIGTYPEDIRS
its a CONFIG dir for your user.. uninstalling a program wont search through the users home dirs..
there was no need to Uninstall azurus :P that i know of.
try making a new user and starting azarus as that user and see if it works.
that imples that its some config file you need to cleanout/remove
see if theres a .Azarus (or whatever als0)
could try again i guess also there may be a .java
